title.rendered: Version 1.3.6.1 – Web version angle inversion fix

content.rendered:
Web version updated to 1.3.6.1

The web version was updated to version 1.3.6.1 to fix a specific issue regarding the possible inversion of layer angles when saved to the cloud. Unfortunately this will affect all scenes saved with version 1.3.6 and then again loaded from the cloud, due to a bug where the web version forgot to update the scene version while saving.

This bug caused any scene saved with version 1.3.6 and then re-loaded to invert the layer angles, in some cases resulting in incorrect rotations for the angles. We are sorry for any confusion or trouble caused by this bug.

The solution can be fixed manually by selecting all your layers and rotating them 180 degrees and then re-saving. Unfortunately this cannot be automatically fixed, so you will have to fix your scenes manually in these cases.
